text: aur (hamane) qaume samood ke paas unake bhaee saaleh ko (paigambar banaakar bheja) to unhonne (apanee qaum se) kaha ai meree qaum khuda hee kee parasatish karo usake siva koee tumhaara maabood nahin usee ne tumako zameen (kee mittee) se paida kiya aur tumako usamen basaaya to usase magaphirat kee dua mogon phir usakee baaragaah mein tauba karo (beshak mera paravaradigaar (har shakhsh ke) qareeb aur sabakee sunata aur dua qubool karata hai
